modName: ADEC Dynasty Armor Recolor - Silver Black
summary: A simple recolor of Acdale\'s Dynasty armor for his ADEC body.
descriptionHtml:
Version: 1.0
Date: 03/21/2012

===============================RequiredFiles=====================================

ADEC Dynasty Armor Standalone
ADEC Dynasty Armor Ebony Replacer
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7782

This mod contains textures only. The original mod is still required.

================================================================================

Description:
A simple recolor of Acdale\'s Dynasty armor for his ADEC body. This mod was created using the files available in Acdale\'s Dynasty Armor v1.19. 

Note:
The recolor may work on past or future body versions of the Dynasty armor.

================================================================================

Install:
NMM Install: Install the Dynasty armor option of your choice. Then install this mod after. Overwrite the original texture files when prompted. 

Manual Install: After you have installed the ADEC Dynasty armor options, extract the contents of this archive to your root Skyrim folder.

Note:
If you install both versions know that the standalone version and ebony replacer version will share the same textures. This is because both mesh files reference the same texture file. As of 03/21/2012 you can\'t for example have the standalone version in the original white color and the ebony replacer version in the new silver/black color. Just throwing that out there since I know it was going to be asked at some point :D

================================================================================

Links:
Be sure to check out his body mod below as well as the other available armors!

Body: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390
Armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7782

================================================================================

Credits:
Acdale for the ADEC body and armor conversion.
Ken1945 for the original Dynasty armor.
author: TardOnPC
